1.subtask_description: Retrieve the current weather information for Seattle, USA.

1.handles: Retrieves current weather information for Seattle.

input_vars.name: ask_messages
input_vars.description: Array of conversation messages to ask about Seattle's current weather.
input_vars.value: [{"role": "user", "content": "What is the current weather in Seattle, USA?"}]

output_vars.name: current_weather_ask
output_vars.description: Current weather information for Seattle from Perplexity_ask.
